mdx.rawBody:
---
status: public
shortDescription: "Constructors must assign values to all fields"
shortCorrection: "Constructors do not need to assign values to all fields"
concepts:
  - Assignment
  - Constructor
  - Field
  - Value
  - Variable
related:
  - id: NoEmptyConstructor
    relation: More general
  - id: LocalVariablesAutoInitialized
    relation: Almost the inverse
  - id: ConstructorParameterIsField
    relation: May co-occur
inOtherPl:
# - pl: JavaScript
#   id: MustInitializeFieldInConstructor
# - pl: Python
#   id: MustInitializeFieldInConstructor
spec:
  - id: jls21
    sections: ["8.3.2", "16"]
plVersion:
# from: jls8
# to: jls14
expressibleInNms:
  - id: StackHeapGlobalDiagram
    how: heap object before and after constructor
references:
  - citationKey: kaczmarczykIdentifyingStudentMisconceptions2010
    phenomena: [PVR1]
    relationship: "related, but about primitive fields"
  - citationKey: ragonisLongtermInvestigationComprehension2005
    phenomena: ["2.3.1"]
---

If a class has a field, that field must be assigned a value in the constructor of that class.

frontmatter.shortDescription: Constructors must assign values to all fields
frontmatter.shortCorrection: Constructors do not need to assign values to all fields
